question.title: Migration of Active WIP Items from jBPM 5.4 to jBPM 7
question.body:
We are currently migrating from jBPM 5.4 to jBPM 7.x, and Iâ€™d like to understand the best approach to handle the work-in-progress (WIP) items that are still active in version 5.4.

Is it possible to migrate the WIP items directly from jBPM 5.4 to jBPM 7?

Or do we need to first migrate from jBPM 5.4 to 6.x, and then proceed to 7.x?

Also, is there any migration script or tool available to support this process?
